pages.title: Installations and medium combustion plant and specified generator permits: ask for pre-application advice

components.content: Please answer the following questions as accurately as possible in order for us to be able to find the team best placed to advise you

components.title: Will or does your activity take place in England?
components.name: NKpEWI

pages.title: You will need to use a different service

components.content:
This pre-application advice service is only for activities in England. You may find similar services at other relevant agencies:  

[Scottish Environment Protection Agency](https://www.sepa.org.uk/regulations/authorisations-and-permits/)

[Natural Resources Wales](https://naturalresources.wales/permits-and-permissions/environmental-permits/pre-application-advice-for-environmental-permits/?lang=en) 

[Northern Ireland Environment Agency](https://www.daera-ni.gov.uk/publications/pollution-prevention-control-permits) 

This is the end of the form.
components.name: gZYuhm

components.title: What is the main  activity you want advice for?
components.name: DXJWgF

pages.title: You need to use a different form

components.content:
This form is just for enquiries related to installations and medium combustion plant and specified generators.

You will need to use the [water quality pre-application advice form](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/environmental-permit-pre-application-advice-form) instead.

This is the end of the form.
components.name: MlHvjz

pages.title: You need to apply for pre-application with Water Resources

components.content:
This form is just for enquiries related to installations and medium combustion plant and specified generators.

You will need to use the [water resources pre-application advice form](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/water-management-apply-for-a-water-abstraction-or-impoundment-licence) instead.

This is the end of the form.
components.name: yfJtSC

pages.title: You need to use another form

components.content:
This form is just for enquiries related to installations and medium combustion plant and specified generators.

You will need to complete the [flood risk management pre-application advice form](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/environmental-permit-pre-application-advice-form) instead.

This is the end of the form.
components.name: JNbwLz

pages.title: You need to apply for radioactive substances pre-application advice

components.content:
This form is just for enquiries related to installations and medium combustion plant and specified generators.

You will need to use the [radioactive substances pre-application advice form](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/environmental-permit-pre-application-advice-form) instead.

This is the end of the form.
components.name: lKtGvi

components.title: Is your pre-application request related to a priority tracked application?
components.name: dxNvxj
components.hint: Information about the Priority Tracked Service is available here: Request environmental permit coordination for major projects - GOV.UK

components.title: What is your priority tracked reference number (if known)?
components.name: DyAYQx

components.title: Do you want to know more about permit applications for the following types of activities, known as 'A1 installations' or are you carrying out a medium combustion or specified generator activity?
components.name: mOPwGp
components.hint: If yes, select which category your main activity will or does fall into. If no, select 'none of the above'. If you are unsure which type of A1 installation your main activity will fall into, then make your selection based on what you think is the most likely option.

components.title: What is or will be your main A1 installations activity that you need pre-application advice about?
components.name: MYHGhL

components.title: What is or will be your main installations activity that you need pre-application advice about?
components.name: gMpHrA

components.title: What is or will be your main A1 installations activity that you need advice about?
components.name: AIxDks

components.title: What is or will be your main chemicals A1 installations activity that you need pre-application advice about?
components.name: zmhOBi

components.title: What is or will be your main A1 waste installation activity that you need pre-application advice about?
components.name: tFwpaW

components.title: What is or will be the main A1 installations activity that you need pre-application advice about?
components.name: GpKNIy

components.title: Will you be operating standby generators within a data centre?
components.name: FWvNGn

components.title: Do your proposed activities include Lithium Ion (Li-Ion) battery shredding?
components.name: tSVQCJ

components.title: Are you a water company or a newly appointed variation?
components.name: GjKnGw

components.title: Does your proposal include the production of hydrogen?
components.name: COmJlN

pages.title: Hydrogen production by electrolysis of water

components.content: Guidance on hydrogen by water electrolysis can be found here on the gov.uk website: [Hydrogen production by electrolysis of water: emerging techniques - GOV.UK](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/hydrogen-production-by-electrolysis-of-water-emerging-techniques)

components.title: Do you propose to produce hydrogen by electrolysis of water?
components.name: iejpzo

components.content:
Guidance for carbon dioxide (CO2) capture can be seen here on the gov.uk website:

[Post-combustion carbon dioxide capture: emerging techniques - GOV.UK](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/post-combustion-carbon-dioxide-capture-best-available-techniques-bat)

[Hydrogen production with carbon capture: emerging techniques - GOV.UK](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/hydrogen-production-with-carbon-capture-emerging-techniques)

components.title: Do you intend to capture the CO2 from your process?
components.name: ROjlJT

components.title: Does the method of carbon dioxide (CO2) capture use amines?
components.name: zKdAit

components.title: What type of intensive farming permit application do you want pre-application advice about?
components.name: htiYbK
components.hint: If you wish to reduce your site boundary you should ask for advice about cancelling (surrendering) part of an existing permit.

components.title: Would you like us to carry out a free intensive farming ammonia screening for you to consider as part of your application?
components.name: ERYsRk

components.title: Which type of intensive farming ammonia screening do you need?
components.name: geAqlA
components.hint: Once you've sent your enquiry, the Environment Agency will email you a more detailed form to fill in. This is so we can gather all of the information needed to complete your intensive farming ammonia screening. We will also ask you for any site layout and location plans. The email will also include a basic advice document specific to intensive farming permit applications.

components.title: What type of permit application do you want pre-application advice about?
components.name: KIXmUp
components.hint: If you wish to reduce your site boundary you should ask for advice about cancelling (surrendering) part of an existing permit.

conditions.displayName: To page 27 - app type - all groups
To page 18 - non-haz waste rec or disp
Is not 'Recovery (or mix of recovery and disposal) of non-hazardous waste with a capacity exceeding 75 tonnes a day'
Steve test condition for 'Are you intending to capture the CO2'
Steve - when to show page 'what type of permit application do you want pre-application advice about?'

items.text: Using, treating, storing or disposing of waste or mining waste, an industrial process, intensive farms, manufacturing or any other business that produce potentially harmful substances.
items.value: Using, treating, storing or disposing of waste or mining waste, an industrial process, intensive farms, manufacturing or any other business that produce potentially harmful substances.

items.text: Discharging (releasing) waste water or liquid to rivers, streams, estuaries, lakes, canals or coastal waters, or to the ground only. For example, if you have a property with a septic tank.
items.value: Discharging (releasing) waste water or liquid to rivers, streams, estuaries, lakes, canals or coastal waters, or to the ground only. For example, if you have a property with a septic tank.

items.text: Taking water from a river, pond, lake or ground only.
items.value: Taking water from a river, pond, lake or ground only.

items.text: Activities involving flood risk management only.
items.value: Activities involving flood risk management only.

items.text: Activities involving radioactive sources or substances only.
items.value: Activities involving radioactive sources or substances only.

items.text: Energy: combustion with on site aggregated rated thermal input of 50 megawatts or more, gasification, liquefaction and refining activities (not including medium combustion plant and specified generators - select specific option below instead)
items.value: Energy: combustion with on site aggregated rated thermal input of 50 megawatts or more, gasification, liquefaction and refining activities (not including medium combustion plant and specified generators - select specific option below instead).

items.text: Standalone medium combustion plant and specified generator activities (less than 50 megawatts)
items.value: Standalone medium combustion plant and specified generator activities (less than 50 megawatts)

items.text: Metals: ferrous metals, non-ferrous metals, surface treating metals and plastic materials
items.value: Metals: ferrous metals, non-ferrous metals, surface treating metals and plastic materials

items.text: Minerals: production of cement and lime, activities involving asbestos, manufacture of glass and glass fibre, other minerals, ceramics
items.value: Minerals: production of cement and lime, activities involving asbestos, manufacture of glass and glass fibre, other minerals, ceramics

items.text: Chemicals: organic, inorganic, fertiliser production, plant health products and biocides, pharmaceutical production, explosives production, manufacturing involving ammonia
items.value: Chemicals: organic, inorganic, fertiliser production, plant health products and biocides, pharmaceutical production, explosives production, manufacturing involving ammonia

items.text: Waste management: incineration and co-incineration of waste, landfills, other forms of disposal of waste, recovery of waste, temporary or underground storage of hazardous waste and treatment of waste water
items.value: Waste management: incineration and co-incineration of waste, landfills, other forms of disposal of waste, recovery of waste, temporary or underground storage of hazardous waste and treatment of waste water

items.text: Other: paper, pulp and board manufacture, carbon, tar and bitumen, coating activities, printing and textile treatments, food industries, intensive farming, and carbon capture & storage
items.value: Other: paper, pulp and board manufacture, carbon, tar and bitumen, coating activities, printing and textile treatments, food industries, intensive farming, and carbon capture & storage

items.value: Incineration and co-incineration of waste exceeding 10 tonnes a day of hazardous waste or 3 tonnes an hour of non-hazardous waste

items.value: Landfill for hazardous or non-hazardous waste (not including inert waste only landfill)

items.value: Biological treatment (anaerobic and aerobic digestion, composting in open windrows or in vessel, mechanical and biological treatment) of hazardous waste (greater than 10 tonnes/day) or non hazardous (greater than 75 tonnes a day or 100 tonnes a day if only treatment is anaerobic digestion)
